sourcesContent: import { InfoContainer, InfoRow, InfoWrapper, Column1, Column2, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, ImgWrap, Img,Button } from "./InfoElements"; const InfoSection = ({ lightBg, lightText, darkText, alt, imgStart, img, description, headLine, topLine, id, linktopage}) => { return ( <> {topLine} {headLine} {description} ); }; export default InfoSection;
